explains: adj. 透明的；水晶般的；水晶制的
wordGroup: crystalline polymer 晶体状聚合物；结晶聚合物
crystalline powder 结晶性粉末；晶体粉末
crystalline form 晶形；结晶形状
crystalline state 晶态，结晶状态
crystalline solid 结晶固体，晶体
crystalline rock 结晶岩石，晶质岩

sentences.en: There have been so much solid crystalline salt beneath the floor of the Mediterranean.
sentences.cn: 在地中海的海底下曾经有那么多的固态结晶盐。

sentences.en: But jarosite on Earth incorporates all kinds of microorganisms into its crystalline structure.
sentences.cn: 但地球上黄钾铁矾的晶体结构中含有各种微生物。

sentences.en: Jarosite is a yellowish-brown mineral with a crystalline structure that's also found on earth.
sentences.cn: 黄钾铁矾是一种黄褐色的矿物，它的晶体结构也存在于地球上。
